Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Cherrypicked this patchset https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/fabric-test/+/32213/ and successfully created network2 on the same cluster (community-quality) with etcdraft and mutual TLS ordering service.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Will create a new folder in under CITest in fabric-test, push networkspec file with the modified test cases.
